Verna:
The message says:
"Unless another Mimir walks among us, there is no way to eliminate Spicula Zero against Mother Nornil's will. The soulless Spicula Zero is immortal, and continues to resurrect. But to restart its cycle of life, it must go through a period of incubation inside Mother Nornil."
You see? Spicula Zero may seem dead and gone, but in fact it isn't.
